metadata.synopsis: The spirit of the amulet comments on entering the Open Hand Temple, where we should look for his granddaughter, Shirra Clarwen.
metadata.how_to_trigger: - Load up GustavDev/BGO_Main_A- Use ReCon command "oe SAM_Start"- Walk into the Open Hand Temple ahead.

0.text: Here we be, ha-ha! Take me to my cherished Shirra, and thy rewards shall be plenty.
